page.title: 02POLITICS
page.content: ON JUNE 20TH 4 BOYS FROM THIS SCHOOL INTERVIEWED OUR EURO M.P. THIS M.P. LOOKS AFTER AN AREA OF EAST LANCS IT CONTAINS 8 WESTMINISTER CONSTITUENCES AND ABOUT HALF A MILLION PEOPLE. HE WORKS IN BRUSSELS BUT LIVES IN GT HARWOOD HE TRAVELS TO MANCHESTER AND THEN BY AIR TO BRUSSELS. HE STAYS IN BELGIUM FOR WEEKS AT A TIME. TO DO HIS JOB WELL HE NEEDS TO KNOW A LOT ABOUT THINGS WHICH HAPPEN IN OTHER COUNTRIES. BUT HE ALSO HAS TO FIND WAYS OF HELPING PEOPLE HERE IN THIS AREA. DURING THE INTERVIEW HE TALKED ABOUT THE FOOD SURPLICES. FOOTBALL HOOLIGANISM AND THE MINERS STRIKE .HE TALKED ABOUT TRYING TO GET MONEY FROM THE E.E.C. TO PROVIDE NEW JOBS FOR GT.HARWOOD.HE SAID THAT SOME MONEY HAD ALREADY BEEN SPENT TO HELP NEW INDUSTRIES HERE.
